channel.title: JMP on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in JMP on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 09 Jun 2024 21:12
item.description: Been looking for a Google voice number replacement for sometime now and looks like I might have found one that meets most of my needs. Just got a JMP number and ordered a sim with a data plan. The cheogram app so far has been great and once I get the SIM I might slowly transition things out of GV.
item.content:encoded: Been looking for a Google voice number replacement for sometime now and looks like I might have found one that meets most of my needs. Just got a JMP number and ordered a sim with a data plan. The cheogram app so far has been great and once I get the SIM I might slowly transition things out of GV.
